name: Yanmega
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.

abilities.name: Sonic Vision
abilities.effect: If you have exactly 4 cards in your hand, ignore all Energy in the attack cost of each of this Pokémon’s attacks.

attacks.name: Assault Boom
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 70 more damage.
